build.buildCommand: python -m pip install --upgrade pip setuptools wheel && pip install -r requirements.txt && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput

deploy.startCommand: python manage.py migrate && gunicorn wildlife_management.wsgi:application --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT --workers 2 --threads 2 --timeout 60 --access-logfile - --error-logfile - --log-level info
